Module org.nasdanika.persistence
Package org.nasdanika.persistence

Class ClassLoaderObjectLoader

java.lang.Object
org.nasdanika.persistence.ClassLoaderObjectLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObjectLoader
public class ClassLoaderObjectLoader extends Object implements ObjectLoader
Creates object instances with ClassLoader. Type shall resolve to fully qualified class name. Classes shall have a 5-argument constructors taking ObjectLoader, config object, URL, ProgressMonitor, and Marker.
Author:
Pavel

  • Constructor Details

    • ClassLoaderObjectLoader

      public ClassLoaderObjectLoader(ClassLoader classLoader, Function<String,String> resolver, ObjectLoader chain)
      Parameters:
      classLoader - ClassLoader for loading classes.
      resolver - Resolver of type to fully qualified class name. If null, then type is used AS-IS. E.g. a map::get for a map of logical names to fully qualified class names.
      chain - Object loader to fall back to if resolver is not null and returned null.
